data.message: I found a vulnerability in the ads manager. If I say then which bonus is waiting for me? P.S. It is a serious vulnerability for facebook.

replies.message: Hey Edg. We recognize and reward researchers who report vulnerabilities in our services. Monetary rewards are entirely at Facebook’s discretion, based on risk, impact, and other factors, information on which can be found here: http://bit.ly/2uGJ8Dw. If you believe you have found a security vulnerability on Facebook, you can submit it to us here: http://bit.ly/2vbRtlP. -Elizabeth
